title: Pons Fabricius
description: The Pons Fabricius (sometimes referred to as the Ponte dei Quattro Capi) is a first century BC bridge in Rome that spans part of the Tiber from the area of the Circus Flaminius to the Tiber island.

properties.description: Coordinates following GeoHack, verified in Google Earth 2013.
properties.title: Imagery location of Pons Fabricius
